sentence.Network_en: Brasilia has quickly established itself as the capital of the country.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴西利亚很快被确立为国家的首都.

sentence.Network_en: Brasilia has been carefully planned for modern living.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴西利亚是为现代生活而精心设计的.

sentence.Network_en: One voter in Brasilia summed up the mood — "Politicians have lost credibility," he complained.
sentence.Network_cn: 一位巴西利亚的选民将人们的心情一言概之——“政客们已无信誉可言”，他抱怨道。
